Serialized Form

  • Package com.kmfahey.jgameoflife

    • Class com.kmfahey.jgameoflife.CellGrid

      class CellGrid extends JComponent implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • animationTimer
          Timer animationTimer
          This Timer object is used to send regular "repaint" events to actionPerformed().
        • automataRunning
          boolean automataRunning
          This boolean is used to track whether the automata animation is running or not.
        • canvasHeight
          int canvasHeight
          This variable is used to store the height of the component, in pixels.
        • canvasWidth
          int canvasWidth
          This variable is used to store the width of the component, in pixels.
        • cellGridHorizDim
          int cellGridHorizDim
          This variable is used to store the horizontal dimension of the cell grid, in cells.
        • cellGridVertDim
          int cellGridVertDim
          This variable is used to store the vertical dimension of the cell grid, in cells.
        • displayGrid
          int[][] displayGrid
          This variable is used to store the active cellular automata grid that is displayed when the component is rendered.
        • FIELD_COLOR
          Color FIELD_COLOR
          This variable holds the default color of the component, as used by paintComponent when it renders the component.
        • STEP
          int STEP
          This variable holds the length of time in milliseconds that the Timer object is instructed to wait between "repaint" events.
        • updateGrid
          int[][] updateGrid
          This variable is used to store the next generation of the cellular automata while it's being calculated.

    • Class com.kmfahey.jgameoflife.GameOfLife

      class GameOfLife extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cellGrid
          CellGrid cellGrid
          This variable stores the JComponent subclass CellGrid object that implements the viewable area where the cellular automata runs.

  • Package com.kmfahey.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl

    • Class com.kmfahey.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.CellGrid

      class CellGrid extends JComponent implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • animationTimer
          Timer animationTimer
          This Timer object is used to send regular "repaint" events to actionPerformed().
        • automataRunning
          boolean automataRunning
          This boolean is used to track whether the automata animation is running or not.
        • canvasHeight
          int canvasHeight
          This variable is used to store the height of the component, in pixels.
        • canvasWidth
          int canvasWidth
          This variable is used to store the width of the component, in pixels.
        • cellGridDispatch
          CellGridDispatch cellGridDispatch
          This variable is used to store the CellGridDispatch object that handles dispatching tasks to the CellGridSections used by this class to handle individual portions of the cell grid.
        • cellGridHorizDim
          int cellGridHorizDim
          This variable is used to store the horizontal dimension of the cell grid, in cells.
        • cellGridSections
          CellGridSection[][] cellGridSections
          This 2d array is used to store the CellGridSection objects that divvy up the cell grid defined in this class to handle its tasks in a distributed fashion.
        • cellGridVertDim
          int cellGridVertDim
          This variable is used to store the vertical dimension of the cell grid, in cells.
        • cellHeight
          int cellHeight
          This variable stores the default height in pixels of a single cell in the cell grid display.
        • cellWidth
          int cellWidth
          This variable stores the default width in pixels of a single cell in the cell grid display.
        • fieldColor
          Color fieldColor
          This variable holds the default color of the component, as used by paintComponent when it renders the component.
        • horizSectionsDim
          double horizSectionsDim
          This variable sets the horizontal dimension of the 2d cellGridSection array that will store subdivisions of the cell grid.
        • sectionsHorizDims
          int[] sectionsHorizDims
          This variable is used to store the horizontal dimensions of each subdivision of the cell grid that is apportioned to the CellGridSection objects instantiated in the CellGrid constructor.
        • sectionsVertDims
          int[] sectionsVertDims
          This variable is used to store the vertical dimensions of each subdivision of the cell grid that is apportioned to the CellGridSection objects instantiated in the CellGrid constructor.
        • stepLengthMillis
          int stepLengthMillis
          This variable holds the length of time in milliseconds that the Timer object is instructed to wait between "repaint" events.
        • vertSectionsDim
          double vertSectionsDim
          This variable sets the vertical dimension of the 2d cellGridSection array that will store subdivisions of the cell grid.

    • Class com.kmfahey.jgameoflife.altthreadedimpl.GameOfLife

      class GameOfLife extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cellGrid
          CellGrid cellGrid
          This variable stores the JComponent subclass CellGrid object that implements the viewable area where the cellular automata runs.
